n: Sugar and Spice Riced Sweet Potato
des: "Brown sugar and a hint of cinnamon perfectly complement the cauliflower and sweet potato in this incredibly simple side dish. Less than 10 minutes until it's on the table. It pairs nicely with roast chicken or pork."
